creator: support@dclux.com
text:
Hello,

I have install 2.0.48 apache with mod_vdbh and MPM worker

MPM=worker emerge apache

The link describe the apache2 gentoo ebuild :

http://www.gentoo.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi/net-www/apache/apache-2.0.48-r1.ebuild

I have configure ServerTokens Prod and ServerSignature Off
but the Signature is still avaible.

Also, i have install a apache2 gentoo without MPM
and here the Signature is no more avaible.

Regards.

creator: trawick@apache.org
text: Exactly where do you see the server signature?

Bug confirmed in Debian/Unstable, Apache 2.0.48, stock .deb

How to produce:
1. Add these

ServerSignature  Off
ServerTokens     ProductOnly

2. Access non-existing page

3. Results in the footer say:

Apache Server at localhost Port 80
creator: jari.aalto@cante.net
nd@perlig.de
text:
Please open a report in your distributor's bug tracker. The problem is not
reproducable with vanilla httpd.

Thanks.
